A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was prepared to be disappointed with this movie. I didn't love TFA\, it was alright- just not great\, so i had a pretty low bar going into TLJ (Hopinig to be pleasantly surprised). TLJ was visually impressive but that's all I can give it. The plot was weak\, the characters= weak. The script was bad\, I'm not sure if the writer just improvised on the spot or what. There seemed to be a lot of forced political issues that I didn't understand. We get it\, girl power hooray! I don't care what gender or race you cast\, just give me some character development\, some decent lines and acting\, maybe a basic plot or even a bit of action would have been nice. Honestly the movie was not the worst movie I've ever seen\, it wasn't as bad as say-World of Warcraft in terms of scripting but it was a chore watching it. I cringed a lot.
